title: Airbnb Market Analysis Dashboard
description: Developed an interactive Tableau dashboard to analyze Airbnb pricing and revenue trends, transforming raw data into actionable market intelligence by showing a strong correlation between property size and price, which helps hosts optimize pricing strategies.

title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Infected & Deaths worldwide Dashboard
description: Designed and developed an interactive Tableau dashboard to visualize the global impact of COVID-19, tracking cases and deaths and synthesizing complex data into key insights like a 2.11% global mortality rate and infection rates by country.

title: Automate API Extraction & Appending Data
description: A dynamic data pipeline that extracts real-time crypto market data from the CoinMarketCap API, transforms it with Pandas for JSON normalization, and visualizes performance trends using Seaborn/Matplotlib.

title: Amazon Price Tracker (Web Scraping & Automation)
description: Automated web scraping solution built in Python using BeautifulSoup and Requests to track Amazon prices, logging data to CSV, and sending email alerts via SMTP when the price drops.

title: Nashville Housing Data Cleaning
description: Cleaned and transformed raw Nashville housing data using advanced SQL techniques (self-joins, CTEs, SUBSTRING/PARSENAME) to populate missing addresses, parse fields, and remove duplicates, resulting in an analysis-ready database.

title: Global COVID-19 Data Exploration
description: Conducted an end-to-end analysis of global COVID-19 data using advanced SQL (joins, CTEs, window functions, temp tables) to derive key insights into infection rates, mortality, and vaccination efficacy, preparing clean data views for visualization tools.

title: Bike Sales Data Analysis
description: Analyzed customer demographics and sales data in Excel, utilizing pivot tables and advanced charts to build an interactive dashboard and uncover the primary buyer profile (middle-aged males, $58K-$60K income in North America/Europe) for targeted marketing.

title: HR Attrition Analysis Dashboard
description: Developed an interactive Excel dashboard analyzing HR attrition (16.1% turnover), identifying key drivers like high attrition among Sales Representatives, Laboratory Technicians, and the 26-34 age group to enable data-driven retention strategies.

title: B&J Biscuit Business Sales Analysis
description: Created a dynamic Excel dashboard for B&J Biscuit that transformed raw sales data into actionable business intelligence through comprehensive analysis of revenue, profitability, and time-series trend tracking (QoQ, MoM, WoW) to drive strategic growth.

title: Coffee Shop Sales Analysis
description: Developed a comprehensive sales performance dashboard in Excel for a coffee shop chain, analyzing 9,971 transactions to uncover that desserts were the top revenue driver due to a high average order value, identifying opportunities to optimize menu placement and profitability.

title: Adventure Works Sales Analysis
description: Delivered a comprehensive sales performance dashboard in Excel for Adventure Works, providing a 360-degree analysis that revealed $307M revenue with a 41.1% margin and identified the top 5 products contributing 25% of profits, informing pricing and regional strategies.

title: Data Professional Survey Analysis
description: Engineered a full data analysis workflow, cleaning data in Excel before building an interactive Tableau dashboard to visualize global trends, revealing top salaries, industry challenges (low salary satisfaction), and Python's dominance.

title: AdventureWorks Sales Analytics
description: Developed an end-to-end Power BI dashboard for AdventureWorks, transforming raw sales data into actionable business intelligence, delivering key insights on revenue ($24.91M), profit ($10.46M), and product return rates.

title: FMCG Growth & Performance Analytics
description: Executed a data-driven FMCG growth project by developing an interactive Power BI dashboard, identifying top-performing stores and discount-based promotions as the key driver of incremental revenue (â‚¹171.99M impact), enabling strategic optimization.

title: Pizza Sales Performance Analysis
description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to analyze pizza sales ($817.86K revenue), identifying peak sales times, top categories (Classic), and best-selling pizzas for strategic foundation in menu optimization and targeted marketing campaigns.

title: Healthcare Financial Analytics Dashboard
description: This Power BI dashboard provides a detailed analysis of $3.36M in healthcare spending, identifying major cost drivers (X-rays and CT Scans accounting for 42% of billing) and geographic billing concentrations, providing actionable financial insights.

title: Daily Brew Coffee Sales Analytics Dashboard
description: This interactive Power BI dashboard analyzes $4.25M in coffee chain revenue, uncovering promo impact (0.69% of sales), high customer loyalty (99.51% repeat rate), peak morning sales ($2.355K), and employee performance (top performer $0.5M), with recommendations for staffing and product optimization.
